title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: fancy satin, brocaded
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Pattern of architectural motifs and large scale vases from which grow large-scale plant forms.  Entire pattern brocaded in pink, green, and tan silks and gold (gold loosely wound on yellow silk core) thread on a white satin ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: fancy satin, brocaded. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-5.
